name: Empire Earth 2: The Art of Supremacy
name_original: Empire Earth 2: The Art of Supremacy
description:
Empire Earth 2: The Art of Supremacy is a strategy game developed by Mad Doc Software. It was originally released in 2006. It was published by Vivendi Universal Games. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Empire Earth 2: The Art of Supremacy is available on PC.
